Home.title: Geo-Natural Corporation
Home.objectivesOne: Facilitating the development of effective quality and environmental strategies and policies in Georgia.
Home.objectivesTwo: Facilitating the creation of effective legal, regulatory and structural framework for market oriented reforms and harmonization with best western (EU) standards in the fields of quality and environment protection.
Home.objectivesThree: Public advocacy, building public awareness, encouraging public participation and civil society control in the fields of quality and environmental protection.
Home.objectivesFour: Promoting good governance, transparent and informed decision making in quality and environmental sectors.
Home.objectivesFive: Professional support to local and regional development programs and projects of strategic significance related to quality and environment.
Home.activityOne: Conducting environmental and social researches and consulting services.
Home.activityTwo: Developing documentation in line with Georgian legislation Environmental and Social Impact Assessments (ESIA), Initial Environmental Examinations (IEE), Environmental Policy Frameworks, Strategic Environmental Assessment (SEA) to obtain positive ecological decisions and related permits from the State institutions.
Home.activityThree: Delivering innovative solutions and helping different organizations to understand and manage their sustainability challenges.
Home.activityFour: Developing documentation in line with international E&S Standards (IFC PSs, Asian Development Bank (ADB) Safeguard Policy Statement (SPS), 2009; World Bank Group General Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) Guidelines, April 2007; World Bank Group EHS Guidelines for Water and Sanitation; International Labor Organization (ILO) conventions covering core labor standards and the basic terms and conditions of employment, etc.) to obtain financing from International Financing Institutions (IFI).
Home.activityFive: Developing and introducing Environmental and Social Management System (ESMS) for different companies and helping them to obtain ISO 14001:2015 on Environmental Management Systems and ISO 45001:2018 on Occupational Health and Safety Management Systems.

About.lorem: Our consulting company, established in 2017, specializes in environmental protection and safety. We collaborate extensively with both public and private sector organizations. Our portfolio includes significant contributions to the development of infrastructural projects and production facilities of various scales.
About.question1: What sets your consulting services apart in environmental protection and safety?
About.question2: How does your company engage with stakeholders and the community?
About.question3: What outcomes can clients expect from your services?
About.question4: How does your company stay updated with evolving standards and regulations?
About.question5: How does your company contribute to local and regional development?
About.answer1: We integrate international best practices with local regulations, ensuring comprehensive solutions tailored to client needs for environmental sustainability and safety.
About.answer2: We prioritize public advocacy, awareness-building, and stakeholder engagement to ensure transparency and accountability in environmental initiatives.
About.answer3: Clients can achieve improved environmental performance, regulatory compliance, enhanced stakeholder relations, and support for sustainable development goals.
About.answer4: We stay informed through collaboration with international bodies, ongoing monitoring of regulatory changes, and continuous professional development to provide current guidance on environmental management and sustainability.
About.answer5: We support local and regional programs with strategic advice on environmental and quality-related issues, promoting sustainable practices and capacity building.

Contact.fillForm: Fill the form and we'll contact you shortly
Contact.name: name
